director.name: 斯玻乐·卡德斯 Spela Cadez

this_title: Orange is the New Black – Unraveled
introduction: To promote the start of season five, Špela Čadež summarises the first four seasons of the legendary US comedy drama show for Netflix. From the streaming provider’s logo to the canteen food through to vomit – Čadež “unravels” her condensed version of the stories from the women’s prison in soft and scratchy wool, yellow as urine and red as blood.
chinese_title: Orange is the New Black – Unraveled
